title: Unplayable lag
body:
I'm facing an incredible ammount of lag these days. 
My speedtest.net results: 
http://www.speedtest.net/result/5569903900.png
Btw I tested it 5x in a row to check whether it was unstable but I always got the same ping/speed.

I have no idea what's causing this lagg but is really killing me. I don't have any kind of lag in other mobas such as Dota or HoTS. Only LoL is causing this lag and it started to happen since last week.

Please help me out. Ty

replies.body:
Each server, service, website or game is located in a **different** physical location. This means your connection will travel along different routes and network infrastructure to get to that specific server. Because of this, there may be issues along one route but not another. 

While we may need to take a look at your route to the League servers specifically, ensuring your local network is compatible with League by following our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a great place to start.

Let me know if you notice any changes in your connection after following the steps outlined in that guide.

I am getting a similar problem as well, random lag spikes through out the day but between 8:30 and 12:00 is just constant 250... but on everything else im still the same low ping around 60

This has been going on since late may or early june, even bought a new router, modem, and new cables thinking it was just my equipment but nothing has changed and my internet provider can't find a problem as well. 

please help and get this noticed for everybody with similar issues. Thank you!
